channel.title: Miles-Bell family history
channel.description: Recent content on Miles-Bell family history

item.title: Ancestry.com on Florence Moor
item.description: Ancestry.com has this entry on Florence Moor: Florence Charlotte Moor (born Dunn), 1876 - Circa 1965 Florence Charlotte Moor (born Dunn) was born on month day 1876, at birth place, to James Dunn and Mary Dunn (born Copley). James was born on August 31 1840, in New Zealand. Mary was born on August 4 1847, in Sheffield, Yorkshire, England. Florence had 6 siblings: Margaret Annie Woolley (born Dunn), Catherine Harriet Miles (born Dunn) and 4 other siblings.

item.title: Ancestry.com on Mona Bracey
item.description: Ancestry.com page on Mona Bracey: Mona Maureen Bracey/Miles from tree Illingworth Family Tree Record information. Birthdate date 1910 city, Far North, Northland, New Zealand Marriageyear New Zealand Deathyear New Zealand Record information. Fathergiven name surname (Born 1885)Mothergiven name surname (1887-year) SpouseKenneth Mervin Robinson (1908-year)

item.title: MyHeritage.com on Eileen Bracey
item.description: From this MyHeritage page on Eileen Bracey: Eileen Ethel Bracey was born on month day 1887, at birth place, to James Dunn and Mary Dunn. Eileen had 6 siblings: Florence Charlotte Moor, James William Copley Dunn and 4 other siblings. Eileen married Alfred Joshua Bracey in 1910, at age 22 at marriage place. They had one daughter: Mona Maureen Robinson. Eileen passed away on month day 1910, at age 23 at death place.

item.title: MyHeritage.com on Elsie Miles
item.description: From this MyHeritage page on Elsie Miles: Elsie Embleton Miles (born Bell), 1910 - 1984 Elsie Embleton Miles (born Bell) was born on month day 1910, at birth place, to Frederick Bell and Elsie Maud Bell (born Smith). Frederick was born on November 17 1875, in Alnwick, Northumberland, United Kingdom. Elsie was born in March 1875, in Kensington, London, England. Elsie had 5 brothers: Brian Stephen Bell, Phillip Cecil Bell and 3 other siblings.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a website for history of the family of Elsie and Edgar Owen Miles.

item.title: Bell - Smith
item.description: Frederick Bell Elsie Maud Smith Frederick and Elsie Maud were married in 1903, in Kensington, England. The FreeBMD GRO reference is: “Jun 1903, Bell Frederick, Kensington 1a 327” The family emigrated from England to New Zealand sometime between 1904 and 1909. The MyHeritage page on Elsie Miles has: Frederick was born on November 17 1875, in Alnwick, Northumberland, United Kingdom. Elsie was born in March 1875, in Kensington, London, England.

item.title: Catherine Harriet Dunn
item.description: Born in 1867 to James Dunn and Mary Copley NZ birth record 1867/12452 Dunn Catherine Hariet Mother: Mary Father: James Married Edgar John Miles

item.title: Dunn - Copley
item.description: See Ancestry.com on Florence Moor From data there, marriage is probably: 1865/4781 Mary Copley James Dunne This is from the NZ records site; there are only 3 marriages to bride name Copley from 1850-1880, only one to Mary Copley. NZ birth records for children: Reg. No Family Name Given Name(s) Mother’s Given Name(s) Father’s Given Name(s) 1864/17490 Dunn Mary Mary James 1867/12452 Dunn Catherine Hariet Mary James 1869/15081 Dunn Mary Elizabeth Mary James 1872/14570 Dunn Margaret Annie Mary James 1875/8095 Dunn Georgina Mary James 1876/14651 Dunn Florence Charlotte Mary James 1877/12924 Dunn James Mary James 1878/9451 Dunn William John Mary James 1880/3310 Dunn Joseph Mary James 1881/18222 Dunn Amelia May Mary James 1883/3065 Dunn James William Capley Mary James 1884/19733 Dunn William Mary James 1887/18829 Dunn Eileen Ethel Mary James Mary Elizabeth married someone called John William Dickins: NZ 1894/2834

item.title: Edgar John Miles
item.description: There is no NZ birth record for “Edgar John Miles”. Only one UK birth record for “Edgar John Miles”, Start date: Mar 1860; End date: Dec 1890: 1872 - MILES Edgar John Warminster 5a 157 Copy of possible birth certificate

item.title: Edgar Owen Miles
item.description: See this Geni page for Edgar Miles. NZ records show Edgar was born in 1905 to Edgar John Miles and Catherine Harriet Dunn The MyHeritage page on Elsie Miles claims that: Edgar was born on August 16 1905. NZ birth record: 1905/1909 Miles Edgar Owen Catherine Harriet Edgar John Edgar Owen married Elsie Bell. He was appointed as a sanitary inspector in April 1940: Edgar Owen avoided military service as a result - see this edition of the Auckland Star June 15, and specifically this page:

item.title: Elsie Embleton Bell
item.description: Elsie was born in New Zealand in 1910 - New Zealand certificate ref 1910/3695, to parents Frederick Bell and Elsie Maud Smith. See Miles-Bell for Elsie’s own marriage and children, and Bell-Smith for Elsie’s parents and siblings. See also the MyHeritage page on Elsie Miles. Elsie died in New Zealand, in 1984, of ovarian cancer.

item.title: Miles - Bell
item.description: About the family of Elsie Miles and Owen Edgar Miles. Edgar Owen Miles Elsie Embleton Bell NZ marriage record 1932/1971 Elsie Embleton Bell Edgar Owen Miles See Geni family tree, probably by Chris Miles. Children: Bruce Miles NZ death record may be: 2002/10501 Miles Fredrick Bruce 23 December 1932 or, conceivably: 2001/10551 Miles Bruce 22 April 1936 Maurice Alan Miles 1935-2005. NZ death record:

item.title: Miles - Dunn
item.description: About the family of Edgar John Miles and Catherine Harriet Dunn. Edgar John Miles Catherine Harriet Dunn NZ marriage record: 1905/4735 Catherine Harriett Dunn Edgar John Miles Both parents went before a jury as plaintiffs for compensation for injuries before NZ supreme court. Also listed in https://paperspast.natlib.govt.nz/imageserver-newspapers/AS19050811.pdf More detail in : The Loverty Bay Herald, Gisborne, Dec 12 1905 - XXXII No 10,537 Last night’s New Zealand News (Per Press Association) Auckland, last night:

item.title: Mona Maureen Miles
item.description: The Ancestry.com on Mona Bracey has the following information: Name: “Mona Maureen Bracey/Miles” Birth year: 1910 Father’s birth year: 1885 Mother’s birth year: 1887 Spouse: “Kenneth Mervyn Robinson” The Geni page for Mona Maureen gives her date of death as September 4, 1990. There is also a Geni page for Kenneth Mervyn Robinson and for their daughter, Jill Maureen (see below). Mona’s NZ records for “birth”, marriage, and death (see below for discussion of birth record):
